hello_message:
I'm a bot for generating test users, files, credit cards and texts. Always ready to save your testing time.

Choose exactly what you need to generate ðŸ‘‡
query_error: Sorry, I don't understand your query, try again.
users_generator: Got it, let's generate test users. Choose how many users you want ðŸ‘‡
users_generator_error: This is beyond my capacity. I can only generate 15 users at a time. Try again.
users_generator_again: If you need more data, select again ðŸ‘‡
files_generator: Got it. I can generate files of various extensions from 1 byte up to 45 megabytes. Choose the extension you need ðŸ‘‡
files_generator_tips: Now choose a unit of measure. A little size guide: 1 kilobyte = 1,024 bytes 1 megabyte = 1,024 kilobytes = 1,048,576 bytes
files_generator_ext_error: You may have chosen the wrong file extension, please choose one from the menu below ðŸ‘‡
files_generator_unit_error: You may have selected the wrong unit of measurement, please choose one from the menu below ðŸ‘‡
files_generator_size_error: Incorrect file size. Please enter the correct one, I only accept positive integers, no spaces or other characters ðŸ™‚
